function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Poor housing conditions with inadequate sanitation facilities and fresh water supply increase outbreak risks","Impact":"Higher spread of contagious diseases such as COVID-19","Mitigation":"Improving housing conditions, sanitation facilities, and water supply","Technologies":"Water purification systems, sanitation infrastructure, ventilation systems","People":"Population in densely populated urban areas, especially those from rural areas","Owner":"Government, urban planners, public health authorities"},{"Description":"Encroachment of natural habitats and closer encounters with wildlife increase the risk of zoonotic infections","Impact":"Higher probability of zoonotic disease outbreaks","Mitigation":"Preservation of natural habitats, urban planning to reduce wildlife encounters","Technologies":"Wildlife monitoring systems, urban green spaces, habitat conservation practices","People":"Urban planners, environmental organizations","Owner":"Environmental agencies, urban planning authorities"},{"Description":"Inadequate ventilation and confined spaces in buildings increase COVID-19 transmission risk","Impact":"Increased transmission of COVID-19 and other contagious diseases","Mitigation":"Improving building ventilation, reducing confined spaces, promoting social distancing measures","Technologies":"HVAC systems, air purification technologies, social distancing monitoring tools","People":"Occupants of crowded buildings, urban residents","Owner":"Building owners, facility managers, public health authorities"}]}
